title: The Male God’s Favorable Impressions Are Difficult to Farm - Novel Updates

description:
The gong has loved the shou for a long time already but he does not dare to confess his feelings. Without any better option, he joined forces with a system to kidnap the shou, dragging him through many quick transmigration worlds in an attempt to capture him. Afterwards…

Shou: This bed partner is very good. Can develop into a long term bed partner.

Gong: Why is it just a bed partner? Let’s agree to love each other!

[Ding! Thanks to your contributions to the Righteous Path all these years, this system has chosen you to complete the task.]
Ye Jun Ge: Did you take your medicine?

System 004: …QAQ>
